canvasJSON:
<mxGraphModel>
  <root>
    <mxCell id="0"/>
    <mxCell id="1" parent="0"/>
    <mxCell id="server" value="<h5 id="toptitle" class="no-selection" style="margin:0px;">server</h5><br><img src="assets/docker_image_icons/host.png" width="48" height="48"><br><h7 id="element_info"><i><br></i></h7>" parent="1" vertex="1" connectable="0" type="NetworkElement" name="server">
      <mxGeometry x="10" y="10" width="140" height="140" as="geometry">
        <mxRectangle width="120" height="40" as="alternateBounds"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="2" style="port;image=/editors/images/ethernet.png;align=right;imageAlign=right;spacingRight=18" parent="server" vertex="1" type="Interface" name="server">
      <mxGeometry y="0.25" width="24" height="24" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="3" style="port;image=/editors/images/ethernet.png;align=right;imageAlign=right;spacingRight=18" parent="server" vertex="1" type="Interface" name="server">
      <mxGeometry y="0.75" width="24" height="24" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="4" style="port;image=/editors/images/ethernet.png;spacingLeft=18" parent="server" vertex="1" type="Interface" name="server">
      <mxGeometry x="1" y="0.25" width="24" height="24" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="5" style="port;image=/editors/images/ethernet.png;spacingLeft=18" parent="server" vertex="1" type="Interface" name="server">
      <mxGeometry x="1" y="0.75" width="24" height="24" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="client" value="<h5 id="toptitle" class="no-selection" style="margin:0px;">client</h5><br><img src="assets/docker_image_icons/host.png" width="48" height="48"><br><h7 id="element_info"><i><br></i></h7>" parent="1" vertex="1" connectable="0" type="NetworkElement" name="client">
      <mxGeometry x="620" y="110" width="140" height="140" as="geometry">
        <mxRectangle width="120" height="40" as="alternateBounds"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="6" style="port;image=/editors/images/ethernet.png;align=right;imageAlign=right;spacingRight=18" parent="client" vertex="1" type="Interface" name="client">
      <mxGeometry y="0.25" width="24" height="24" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="7" style="port;image=/editors/images/ethernet.png;align=right;imageAlign=right;spacingRight=18" parent="client" vertex="1" type="Interface" name="client">
      <mxGeometry y="0.75" width="24" height="24" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="8" style="port;image=/editors/images/ethernet.png;spacingLeft=18" parent="client" vertex="1" type="Interface" name="client">
      <mxGeometry x="1" y="0.25" width="24" height="24" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="9" style="port;image=/editors/images/ethernet.png;spacingLeft=18" parent="client" vertex="1" type="Interface" name="client">
      <mxGeometry x="1" y="0.75" width="24" height="24" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="sniffer" value="<h5 id="toptitle" class="no-selection" style="margin:0px;">sniffer</h5><br><img src="assets/docker_image_icons/host.png" width="48" height="48"><br><h7 id="element_info"><i><br>14500=&gt;14500<br></i></h7>" parent="1" vertex="1" connectable="0" type="NetworkElement" name="sniffer">
      <mxGeometry x="620" y="310" width="140" height="140" as="geometry">
        <mxRectangle width="120" height="40" as="alternateBounds"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="10" style="port;image=/editors/images/ethernet.png;align=right;imageAlign=right;spacingRight=18" parent="sniffer" vertex="1" type="Interface" name="sniffer">
      <mxGeometry y="0.25" width="24" height="24" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="11" style="port;image=/editors/images/ethernet.png;align=right;imageAlign=right;spacingRight=18" parent="sniffer" vertex="1" type="Interface" name="sniffer">
      <mxGeometry y="0.75" width="24" height="24" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="12" style="port;image=/editors/images/ethernet.png;spacingLeft=18" parent="sniffer" vertex="1" type="Interface" name="sniffer">
      <mxGeometry x="1" y="0.25" width="24" height="24" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="13" style="port;image=/editors/images/ethernet.png;spacingLeft=18" parent="sniffer" vertex="1" type="Interface" name="sniffer">
      <mxGeometry x="1" y="0.75" width="24" height="24" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="internal_network" value="<h5 class="no-selection">internal_network</h5><h6>192.168.2.1</h6>" style="shape=cloud" parent="1" vertex="1" type="Network" name="internal_network">
      <mxGeometry x="210" y="160" width="120" height="120" as="geometry">
        <mxRectangle width="120" height="40" as="alternateBounds"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="external_network" value="<h5 class="no-selection">external_network</h5><h6>192.168.3.1</h6>" style="shape=cloud" parent="1" vertex="1" type="Network" name="external_network">
      <mxGeometry x="380" y="310" width="120" height="120" as="geometry">
        <mxRectangle width="120" height="40" as="alternateBounds"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="router" value="<h5 id="toptitle" class="no-selection" style="margin:0px;">router</h5><br><img src="assets/docker_image_icons/host.png" width="48" height="48"><br><h7 id="element_info"><i><br></i></h7>" parent="1" vertex="1" connectable="0" type="NetworkElement" name="router">
      <mxGeometry x="100" y="310" width="140" height="140" as="geometry">
        <mxRectangle width="120" height="40" as="alternateBounds"/>
      </mxGeometry>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="18" style="port;image=/editors/images/ethernet.png;align=right;imageAlign=right;spacingRight=18" parent="router" vertex="1" type="Interface" name="router">
      <mxGeometry y="0.25" width="24" height="24" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="19" style="port;image=/editors/images/ethernet.png;align=right;imageAlign=right;spacingRight=18" parent="router" vertex="1" type="Interface" name="router">
      <mxGeometry y="0.75" width="24" height="24" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="20" style="port;image=/editors/images/ethernet.png;spacingLeft=18" parent="router" vertex="1" type="Interface" name="router">
      <mxGeometry x="1" y="0.25" width="24" height="24" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="21" style="port;image=/editors/images/ethernet.png;spacingLeft=18" parent="router" vertex="1" type="Interface" name="router">
      <mxGeometry x="1" y="0.75" width="24" height="24" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="22" value="192.168.2.3" parent="1" source="5" target="internal_network" edge="1">
      <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="23" value="192.168.2.2" parent="1" source="18" target="internal_network" edge="1">
      <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="26" value="" parent="1" source="10" target="external_network" edge="1">
      <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="28" value="192.168.2.2" parent="1" source="20" target="external_network" edge="1">
      <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
    <mxCell id="29" value="" parent="1" source="7" target="external_network" edge="1">
      <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/>
    </mxCell>
  </root>
</mxGraphModel>

addctf.description: Add a ctf in /home/<username> directory inside a secret file
addctf.name: addctf

firewall.description: Exec an iptable rule (-i arg filled with IP of interface,       it will be replaced with proper interface
firewall.name: firewall
